data.title: Babies ‘R’ Us to open shops in 200 Kohl’s stores this fall, including one on Staten Island
data.meta_description: The immersive, in-store shopping experience will include strollers, car seats and bassinets, plus thousands of other essentials.
data.text:
STATEN ISLAND, N.Y. -- You’ll soon be able to buy bottles, cribs and other baby essentials at 200 Kohl’s stores nationwide, including Staten Island’s Mariners Harbor location, as the company launches a partnership with Babies R Us this fall.

“The in-store Babies “R” Us experience is designed to offer shoppers the opportunity to interact with the product,” Kohl’s noted in a press release, describing the immersive, in-store shopping experience that has already started to roll out in select stores across the country and is expected to launch in Staten Island soon. “With some of the top strollers, car seats and bassinets on display, parents can see and feel these important items to choose the gear right for their lifestyle and feel confident in their purchases.”

Kohl’s said in the release that expecting and current parents will now be able to shop “a curated assortment of trusted baby brands, including thousands of new products” in-store and online. Customers will also be able to use the Babies R Us at Kohl’s registry to build and share gift lists. The company also announced Motherhood as its new, exclusive in-store maternity brand.

Here’s a full list of Kohl’s stores that will be getting Babies R Us shops this year.
